TextView.android:text:
This app allows you to to convert PDF files to PNG files with ease. All you have to do is hit the 'Upload' button on the main screen, and select the image you want to convert to a PNG. Then you can upload an unlimited ammount of these newly made PNG files to the image sharing website Imgur. Then when you want to pull up that image again just hit 'Download' and the PNG file will automatically convert back into a PDF file.
Created by Vivek Gupta and Navin Tiwary.
